mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict( identifier, name, group_identifier, group_name, sort ) values( #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort} )
mapper.update: update sys_dict set identifier = #{value}, name = #{label}, group_identifier = #{type}, group_name = #{description}, sort = #{sort} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, identifier value, name label, group_identifier type, group_name description, sort from sys_dict where id = #{id}
